### Complete the tutorial for **week 11** based on the test you use most often: 

:::ojtask

Work through either the discovr_10 (moderation & mediation), discovr_11 (ANOVA), discovr_12 (ANCOVA), discovr_13 (factorial designs), discovr_14 (repeated measures designs), discovr_15 (mixed designs), discovr_17 (exploratory factor analysis), or discovr_20 (logistic regression) tutorial by pasting the below code into the **Console** in RStudio & pressing **Enter**. Bayesian methods will not be covered in the practical sessions so it is up to you whether you want to complete those sections of the tutorials. 

```{r, eval = F, echo = T}
learnr::run_tutorial("discovr_10", package = "discovr")
```

```{r, eval = F, echo = T}
learnr::run_tutorial("discovr_11", package = "discovr")
```
